item id [id]: 414
armor id [armor]: 191 (Helmet of Invisibility)
protection, head [prothead]: 23
(unremovable [cursed], spirit-sight [spiritsight], invisibility [invisibility])

Requires 15D to forge (D3)

This helmet was made by some of the best cyclops smiths of Tartarus as a gift to the Titan of the Underworld. Anyone wearing it cannot be seen by the living.
